author: Portland Press Herald
title: Ground News - Bath-built destroyer helps shoot down 5 missiles, 12 drones in Houthi attack
text:
Summary by Portland Press Herald U.S. forces, including the USS Laboon, shot down the barrage in the Red Sea; it was the latest Houthi attack in the Middle East in support of Hamas. Share menu More
